body_html: After I opened this, a colleague mentioned to me that the tensorflow bincount is nice but not as much of a speedup as it could be for our application (counting many histograms in parallel). A significant speedup might be obtained for GPUs if there were a bincount(dim=X) version that can do many bincounts in parallel.

A significant speedup might be obtained for GPUs if there were a bincount(dim=X) version that can do many bincounts in parallel.
body: After I opened this, a colleague mentioned to me that the tensorflow bincount is nice but not as much of a speedup as it could be for our application (counting many histograms in parallel). A significant speedup might be obtained for GPUs if there were a bincount(dim=X) version that can do many bincounts in parallel.
